title: Why do you let people say things like "EZ"
body: There are very angering words and abbreviations that put hot grease into a total lose like "EZ" and "Git Gud" which make me very frustrated and thrown into a huge rage. Why does Riot even let the players say that when they know that it makes people want to smash their computer into a million pieces? Behavior like this very is unsportsman like and rude when this happens to people on the receiving end of a massive loss. I want to play the game for fun, but it does not end up fun when you're steamrolled by the opposing team and instead it turns into the enemy team recall taunting you and killing you with provoking. Will there ever be any sort of change in the future or being thought of that will stop players from saying provoking phrases or words like "EZ"?

replies.body: This one again. Let it go.
I'm pretty sure this is sarcasm
Why do you get so upset over it?
It is meaningless trash talk, i see it used by losing teams and after close games or absurd comebacks more often than in stomps.
report them post game and then go into option and disable /all chat
